message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. How about we try $110?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $95 is a fair price. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $105, but that's as high as I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, and I really want this product. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but I was thinking more along the lines of $97. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still not comfortable with $97. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about we try $102?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm getting close to my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I think we're getting close to the product's true value. How about we meet in the middle at $101?
